Master Answer: The BCCDC does not offer vaccine education workshops for the public. We encourage you to contact your local pubic health unit for information on whether or not this service is offered through your local health authority. You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here.
Master Question: Does BCCDC or health authorities outreach to the community organizations and provide vaccines education to the general public? We're looking for an educator for a workshop. Thanks!
